"Just like a Pill" is the third single released from P!nk&#039;s second album M!ssundaztood. The song peaked at number eight on U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and number one on UK Singles Chart. It was produced by Dallas Austin.

The video for "Just Like A Pill" was shot by Francis Lawrence. The video for the song is considerably different from her previous videos. "Get The Party Started" and "Don&#039;t Let Me Get Me" were lighter than the dark side that is reflected in the video for "Just Like A Pill". Several scenes are there with P!nk. In the first scene P!nk lies on the floor with a black outfit. In the chorus she is sitting aside of a lot of men running in a circle. She is also featured in a scene also in a black outfit with white rabbits around her and an elephant. There are scenes with P!nk and her band, and at the end she runs in a hall.

In the video P!nk uses an elephant. After the animal had been on the set she saw the abuse and captivity the animal was in. ?Pink learned about the abuse of captive elephants when a trainer brought one onto the set of her ?Just Like a Pill? video. She could see that something was wrong and she called us to learn more about the issue. Now, Pink would like to see circuses pack their trunks", according to PETA spokesman Dan Mathews.
